document_data.mainbody:
Constal Taggar Kenric was a military officer of the Marsember Watch who served Cormyr during the 15 century DR.
In addition to being a dedicated soldier, Taggar was a devoted follower of the deity Helm.
He came from a long line of Helmite worshipers who dedicated themselves to routing out the corrupt behavior that was so prevalent in the Watch. He had a son named Kleef, who served as Helms chosen during the events of the Second Sundering.
